content.p: Our MBA programme organises international study tours for students every year, with destinations focused on emerging markets. Past study tours have taken students to Shanghai, Ningbo, Beijing and Taiwan. Tours have included visits to global companies such as Lenovo and Tencent. Nottingham University Business School (NUBS) Malaysia MBA students are also invited to participate in MBA study tours organised by NUBS UK, which include tours to the United States, China and other parts of the world. Find out more about MBA study tours. Students on various undergraduate and postgraduate modules have the opportunity to participate in industry visits to multinational corporations as well as regional and local businesses located in Malaysia, to meet with company executives and observe how concepts learnt in class are implemented in practice. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
